issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The webview with background image shows a white blank space when zoom out on webview is done.

Not a Regression. The issues exists as far as 1.8.2

The issue occurs on Android 2.X and 3.X. It does not happen on Android 4.X.

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open Kitchen Sink application
2. Go to Base UI -> Views -> Web Views -> Local URL
3. Swipe on the screen to get the zoom control
4. Click on the Zoom out button one or more times

Actual: A white blank space start to show below the web view

Expected: Zoom Out should not show any white space
fields.summary: Android: WebView: Zooming out of webview with image background shows blank area on Android 2.X and 3.X
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.0.201206211609
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120621184154
Android Device: LG P970(V2.2), Android Emulator 2.3.3, Samsung Tab(V3.2)
Runtime: v8

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
